app_descript:
Brief: Telegram X, an advanced rendition of the popular messaging app Telegram, offers users a sophisticated alternative to the traditional Telegram client. It's built on the robust TDLib framework to ensure boosted performance, smoother animations, and access to experimental features that are yet to be adopted in the mainstream version.
